title: Report to the gods
creator_contributor_role: Hong Kong Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Hong Kong - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Housing - Hong Kong
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Hong Kong - Description and travel
History/Hong Kong - History - Transfer of Sovereignty from Great Britain, 1997
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Housing - Hong Kong
description: A review of Hong Kong showing many aspects of life in the great city as seen through the eyes of a 'household god' who comes to life. He reports to the gods on what his family has achieved in the previous year, in the fields of education, housing and medicine, and in the making of all the fine things of the old world and all those of the new world.
